sentences.en: It is the inevitable outcome that complies with new natural view to reappraise natural value.
sentences.cn: 重估自然价值是顺应新的自然图景的必然产物.

sentences.en: People began to reappraise their values.
sentences.cn: 人们开始重新审视他们的价值观。

sentences.en: This research will help people to reappraise the smoke fatalness.
sentences.cn: 该研究可帮助人们重新认识烟气的危险性.

trans.tran_en: to examine something again in order to consider whether you should change it or your opinion of it
